mapper.sql: id, content, title, goods_ids, satisfy_price, favorable_price, create_time, start_time, end_time, state, note, manager_id
mapper.insert:
insert into activity
id,
content,
title,
goods_ids,
satisfy_price,
favorable_price,
create_time,
start_time,
end_time,
state,
note,
manager_id,

#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{satisfyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.update:
update activity
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_ids = #{goodsIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
satisfy_price = #{satisfyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
favorable_price = #{favorablePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update activity set content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_ids = #{goodsIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, satisfy_price = #{satisfyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, favorable_price = #{favorablePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
